thread.title: The Bancorp to Launch Live Interview Series at Money20/20
thread.title_full: The Bancorp to Launch Live Interview Series at Money20/20

author: admin
title: The Bancorp to Launch Live Interview Series at Money20/20
text:
The Bancorp, Inc. 
WILMINGTON, Del. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- As the Official Bank of Money20/20, The Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ: TBBK) is pleased to announce its presentation of Finetics™ Studio, a new executive interview series to take place within the company’s high-profile exhibitor space at Money20/20, Oct. 25-28. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005056/en/ 
The interview series will feature one-on-one, candid conversations with industry influencers from innovative payment and financial technology companies, ranging from start up founders to Fortune 500 executives. 
“We’re very excited to have our long-standing sponsor The Bancorp debut Finetics™ Studio at Money20/20 this year,” said Anil Aggarwal, Chairman of Money20/20. “This series will provide conference attendees with yet another opportunity to gain insights from industry leaders, complementing our event’s panel and session discussions.” 
Sarah Gill, senior reporter with PaymentEye, will serve as moderator and cover topics such as block-chain technology, P2P and mobile payments, security and regulatory challenges, real-time payments progress and prepaid cards, among others. 
“Financial services companies have seen plenty of challenges and opportunities over the last few years, but with the disruption of finance still in its infancy there's surely more of that ahead,” Gill said. “Finetics™ Studio gives us the chance to learn about the ways our industry’s innovators are finding success in such a dynamic environment and discuss solutions to the hurdles holding them back.” 
In addition to the live event, each interview will be recorded on video and shared on The Bancorp’s new Finetics™ blog, as well as through PaymentEye. 
“We’re very excited to debut Finetics™ Studio at this year’s Money20/20 conference,” said Frank Mastrangelo, CEO of The Bancorp. “As the financial services engine behind some of the most innovative companies in payments today, it makes sense for us to capture and share the candid insights of the leaders that are shaping our industry’s future.” 
Executives from The Bancorp will also be participating in two panel sessions at Money20/20. Pawneet Abramowski, senior vice president and director of AML/sanctions compliance, will participate in “State Money Transmitter Laws: Are They Killing Payments Industry Innovation?” from 1 pm to 1:50 pm, Sunday, Oct. 25. Mastrangelo will be a part of “The Evolution of Payment Card Solutions for the Underbanked,” from 8 am to 8:50 am, Monday, Oct. 26. 
Finetics™ Studio presented by The Bancorp will be located at booth 1904 on the Money20/20 exhibit hall floor. 
About The Bancorp 
The Bancorp (NASDAQ: TBBK) is a family of financial service companies dedicated to setting a new standard in financial services and payments innovation. With operations in both the U.S. and Europe, its subsidiaries are licensed participants of the SWIFT international funds transfer network and maintain memberships with numerous payments networks, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover, Star, NYCE, PULSE, Plus, Maestro, Accel, UnionPay, and AFFN. The Bancorp is a Founding Member of NBPCA, a Direct Financial Institution Member of NACHA, a Benefactor of the Emerging Payments Association (UK), and an active participant in the Electronic Transactions Association. For more information, please visit www.thebancorp.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005056/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
